path.style: fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 75; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(197, 57, 57);
fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(128, 128, 128); fill: rgb(197, 57, 57);
